metadata.name: Classic Memory Match
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Flip cards to find matching pairs. Test your memory skills!

instructions.overview: Find all matching pairs by remembering card locations. Match cards by rank (suit doesn't matter).
setup: 20 random cards are selected and shuffled
Cards are laid face-down in a 4Ã—5 grid
Timer starts on first card flip
gameplay: Click any face-down card to flip it over
Click a second card to find its match
If cards match (same rank), they stay face-up
If cards don't match, they flip back after 1 second
Remember locations to find pairs faster
Try to match all pairs in fewest moves
instructions.winning: Match all 10 pairs to win. Challenge yourself to beat your best time!
